plot: A Human rights story about a Hungarian refugee who enters her school's "I Am An American Day" essay contest and the committee objects because she is a foreigner.
title: Children of Strangers
plot_es: A Human rights story about a Hungarian refugee who enters her school's "I Am An American Day" essay contest and the committee objects because she is a foreigner.
plot_en: A Human rights story about a Hungarian refugee who enters her school's "I Am An American Day" essay contest and the committee objects because she is a foreigner.
